channel.title: How can i stop people from teleporting while pking?
channel.description: Hey guys... if anyone could tell me how to stop people from teleporting while pking then that would be really great.. if you need any codes from me just ask & ill post them sine i don't know which ones u will be needing.. thanks ! :D

item.title: How can i stop people from teleporting while pking?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

This code is pretty messy.

I’m not sure what source you have. These are the codes for Delta so they MIGHT not work. (I’m no pro coder.)

First you want to declare a boolean in your client.java (source)

[code=java] public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

    if (Type == 1) {
        if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
                && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) {

outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeString(“Attack”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}[/code]

Next in your teleport method (Delta uses triggerTele). you are going to want to add this code:

if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){ sM("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!"); return;

Read full topic
item.source: How can i stop people from teleporting while pking?
